useCase.name: Customer Gives Comment on a Dish

mainSequence.step: UI requests list of orders from Backend.
Backend fetches customer orders from DB.
UI shows list of orders to Customer.
Customer selects a dish from an order in UI.
UI requests dish details from Backend.
Backend fetches dish details from DB.
DB returns dish details to Backend.
Backend displays dish details in UI.
UI shows dish details to Customer.
Customer enters comment and submits in UI.
Backend saves comment to dish in DB.
DB confirms the save to Backend.
Backend displays success message in UI.
UI shows confirmation of comment submission to Customer.
